Title: Authorizes a person to petition for expungement of records of arrest, investigation, detention and computer databases in certain instances
Summary: Authorizes a person to petition for expungement of records of arrest, investigation, detention and computer databases in certain instances where such person may have been falsely arrested, whose case was dismissed, or where innocent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to expungement of criminal records and penalties for violation of such provisions
